region.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits
region.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: efforts to bring peace to the region
Flooding is likely in some coastal regions of the Northeast during the early part of the week.
region.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a particular part of someone’s body
region.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a fairly large area of a country or of the world
region.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The north-east region has been suffering high unemployment.
There are already over 200 teleworkers in the region.
region.translation[1].definitions[1].def: used to describe an amount of money etc without being exact
region.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Their annual sales are somewhere in the region of £300 million.
